title: The delinquents pasport [sic] or, A plaintiffs petitionary plea, addressed to an eminent counseller of state: upon his Highness Proclamation, commanding all delinquents, &c. to depart the Citty and return to their own native country.
notes: Verse - "Confined Sir! For what? Where I do live".
Includes: Additionall lines, in relation to these injunctive times.
Imperfect: L (Luttrell) copy torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
